## CharityORG.getRarity() method

Get event rarity.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getRarity(Event_Name: string): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Event\_Name | string | Name of Event |

**Returns:**

number

An events rarity

## Remarks

RAM cost: 32 GB

Returns the rarity of the event. You need to give it an event name to check. Returns -1 if the name given has no event (ex: beg)
